source_objects.description: Achieve your entrepreneurship dreams with courses on: lean start-up, developing a business plan, and launching your venture.
source_objects.title: Entrepreneurship

items.title: Market Research 101: Market Test Your Idea in Just 5 Hours
items.headline: Use marketing tools- AdWords, Analytics, and Landing Pages- to test if your product will sell before creating it.
objectives_summary: Create a landing page to represent your business idea
Track visitor data on your landing page
Drive traffic from Google to your website

items.title: Venture Pitching Made Easy: The Full Pitching Guide
items.headline: Learn From A Venture Capitalist About Venture Capital, Learn The 10 Step Pitching Formula & How To Convince Others
objectives_summary: Apply for venture capital and understand how to convince a venture capitalist of their business idea
Pitch their product idea to venture capitalists and understand their focus
Use the 10 Step Venture Pitching Formula in order to structure pitches 5x more quickly

items.title: Entrepreneurship: Becoming A Successful Entrepreneur

visible_instructors.display_name: Libby Seery Founder of Renaissance Life Therapies
visible_instructors.name: Libby Seery
visible_instructors.title: Libby Seery Founder of Renaissance Life Therapies

items.headline: Two top Instructors combine to provide the psychological and practical skills you need to succeed as an entrepreneur!
objectives_summary: Make confident decisions securing your success as an entrepreneur
You'll learn how to recognise negative self limiting beliefs and eradicate them forever
You'll no longer procrastinate or waste precious time

items.title: Work From Home: How to Start a Home Daycare Business
items.headline: Learn what it takes to start and operate a home daycare business!
objectives_summary: Learn how to set up your business legally and physically
Learn how to maintain compliance with regulatory agencies
Establish processes and procedures for efficient operations

items.title: Startup Sales- The Guide for going from 0-1Million+
items.headline: Let's make the jump, together
objectives_summary: Find customers for your product in a repeatable and predictable way
Apply the 3 Question messaging framework to their outreach
Develop a process for testing and iterating your sales process for optimal growth

items.title: How to Write a Business Plan
items.headline: How to write a complete business plan in 12 easy steps.
objectives_summary: After completing this course you will understand the importance of having a business plan.
After completing this course you will understand the requisite components that make up a good business plan.
After completing this course, you will be able to craft a complete business plan, including a supporting financial model.

objectives_summary: VC Valuation Model
VC Investment Decision-Making Process
Key Sections of the VC Term Sheets
